short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies StubHub URLs and VividSeats prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seeing fees on Stubhub and Vividseats without having the option checked can often be confused for scalpers. This tool lets people see the real price before those pesky fees!
